name: Tatankasaurus
title: Tatankasaurus: Spirited Charge
desc: To a charging Tatankasaurus, solid Pulverite is no more imposing an obstacle than gently wafting steam, while the surfaces of water and liquid Phlogiston alike are as stable and supportive as a road.

skills.desc:
Technique: Spirited State
Usage(s): 2
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)
